{{disambig-more|Rose|[[Rose (disambiguation)]]}} {{infobox character | people=[[Hobbits|Hobbit]] | name=Rosa Baggins | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Great Smials]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{SR|1256}}{{App|Baggins}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | family=[[Baggins Family]] | parentage=[[Ponto Baggins I|Ponto Baggins]] and [[Mimosa Bunce]] | siblings=[[Polo Baggins|Polo]] | spouse=[[Hildigrim Took]] | children=[[Adalgrim Took|Adalgrim]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Rosa Baggins''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]]. ==History== Rosa was the daughter of [[Ponto Baggins I|Ponto Baggins]] and [[Mimosa Bunce]]. She married [[Hildigrim Took]], son of [[Gerontius Took|the Old Took]]. They had only one child, [[Adalgrim Took|Adalgrim]], born in {{SR|1280|n}}.{{App|Took}} ==Etymology== [http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/rosa#Latin Rosa] is the Latin name for the [[Rose (disambiguation)|rose]]. ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | BAL |y| BER | | |BAL=[[Balbo Baggins]]
